statements: SELECT * FROM fuel_emission_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type FROM fuel_emission_data WHERE emissions_rating > 3;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_consumption FROM fuel_emission_data WHERE fuel_type = 'Gasoline';
SELECT * FROM fuel_emission_data WHERE emissions_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT MAX(emissions_rating) AS max_rating FROM fuel_emission_data;
SELECT * FROM fuel_emission_data WHERE emissions_rating > 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type FROM fuel_emission_data WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel';
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_consumption FROM fuel_emission_data ORDER BY fuel_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_emission_data WHERE fuel_type = 'Petrol' AND emissions_rating < 3;
SELECT AVG(fuel_consumption) AS average_consumption FROM fuel_emission_data;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption;
SELECT vehicle_id, consumption_date, fuel_quantity FROM fuel_consumption;
SELECT fuel_type, fuel_quantity FROM fuel_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_emissions ORDER BY emission_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, co_emissions, co2_emissions FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE emission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = 1 ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, AVG(fuel_quantity) AS avg_fuel_quantity FROM fuel_consumption GROUP BY vehicle_id, fuel_type;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE co_emissions > 50 AND co2_emissions > 100 ORDER BY emission_date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, SUM(co_emissions) AS total_co_emissions, SUM(co2_emissions) AS total_co2_emissions FROM vehicle_emissions GROUP BY vehicle_id;

SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, SUM(fuel_quantity) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption WHERE consumption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY vehicle_id, fuel_type ORDER BY total_fuel_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT manufacturer, model FROM VehicleInformation WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT SUM(liters_consumed) FROM FuelConsumption;
SELECT vehicle_id, emission_type, emission_value FROM VehicleEmissions ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM VehicleInformation WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT * FROM FuelConsumption;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, liters_consumed FROM FuelConsumption ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM VehicleInformation WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV';
SELECT vehicle_id, emission_type, emission_value FROM VehicleEmissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' ORDER BY emission_value DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year, fuel_type, liters_consumed, consumption_date FROM FuelConsumption JOIN VehicleInformation ON FuelConsumption.vehicle_id = VehicleInformation.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption WHERE fuel_consumed > 10;
SELECT id, emission_type, emission_value FROM vehicle_emissions ORDER BY emission_value DESC;
SELECT model, year FROM vehicle_data WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT fuel_type, description FROM fuel_types WHERE fuel_type = 'Gasoline';
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption ORDER BY mileage DESC, fuel_type ASC;
SELECT fuel_consumed, mileage FROM fuel_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = 100 ORDER BY fuel_consumed DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, model, year FROM vehicle_data WHERE year > 2010 AND model LIKE 'Toyota%';
SELECT vehicle_id, emission_type, emission_value FROM vehicle_emissions WHERE emission_value > 50 ORDER BY emission_value ASC;
SELECT fuel_type, SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption GROUP BY fuel_type ORDER BY total_fuel_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_info;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicle_info WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT driver_name, driver_age FROM driver_info ORDER BY driver_age DESC;
SELECT trip_id, trip_start, trip_end FROM trip_data WHERE distance_traveled > 100 ORDER BY trip_start ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_consumed, fuel_cost FROM fuel_consumption WHERE fuel_cost < 50 ORDER BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_info
SELECT fuel_type, fuel_consumed, fuel_cost FROM fuel_consumption ORDER BY fuel_cost DESC
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle_info WHERE year > 2015
SELECT driver_name, driver_age FROM driver_info WHERE driver_age >= 30 ORDER BY driver_name
SELECT trip_id, trip_start, trip_end, distance_traveled FROM trip_data WHERE distance_traveled > 100 ORDER BY trip_start DESC
